item.description:
Please see the message below from Karen with Like No Udder.

I hope you guys are doing well! The 2nd Annual May Brunch (taking place May 13th) is fast approaching and I was hoping, if you have not already done so, could share this with the folks on meetup. We have just under 2 weeks left before ticket sales close and there are still seats available. All the info is on my website, including menu, location and ticket purchasing. Hopefully we can make it a full house and create a space for new and old friends to gather.
Thank you for your help! And if you need to call for any reason, I can always be reached at 401.419.8869.

Be well,

Karen

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Like No Udder 2nd Annual Vegan May Brunch
